abstract: The $702 million profit was a far cry from the $2.97 billion the bank earned in the fourth quarter of 2007, but still topped analysts’ expectations of flat earnings or a loss.
snippet: The $702 million profit was a far cry from the $2.97 billion the bank earned in the fourth quarter of 2007, but still topped analysts’ expectations of flat earnings or a loss.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase reported a $702 million profit for its fourth quarter on Thursday, topping forecasts.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
